name: MEC Soche Midweight Gloves - Unisex
description:
The Soche Gloves have a soft inner face that's bonded to a windproof, water-resistant outer. For most outings, you can wear them on their own. When it gets a little nastier out, slip them under a pair of hard shell gloves for total protection.Outer surface is polyurethane coated soft shell, bonded to a cozy fleece interior.DWR finish on the outside enhances water resistance.Index fingers and thumbs have touchscreen-friendly overlays.Cuffs have stretchy bindings to keep drafts out.Clips keep them together when you're not wearing them.

        Sustainability
